responsive.label: Responsive html
responsive.comment: Enable/disable responsive mode for all gadget (iphone, ipad etc)

catalog_mode.label: Catalog mode
catalog_mode.comment: Create your shopping cart into simple catalog
catalog_mode.tooltip: This mode turns off add to cart buttons, account profile and cart functionality

ajax_add_to_cart.label: Ajax add to cart
ajax_add_to_cart.comment: Add to cart without render of the page

ajax_wish_comp.label: Ajax for add to wishlist/compare button
ajax_wish_comp.comment: Enable Ajax feature for wish list and compare buttons

ajax_toolbar.label: Ajax for toolbar/paging
ajax_toolbar.comment: Enable Ajax feature for sort / paging buttons

show_add_to_cart.label: Show add to cart button on product rollover

show_add_to_wishlist.label: Show add to wishlist button on product rollover

show_add_to_compare.label: Show add to compare button on product rollover

show_compare_link_in_header.label: Show compare link in header toplinks

facebook_profile_name.label: Facebook profile name
facebook_profile_name.comment: Account ID for Facebook fan box. If you want use your own facebook code - do changes in file app/design/frontend/evoque/default/template/evoque/facebook_fan_box.phtml

twitter_account.label: Account name
twitter_account.comment: Account name for twitter block. If you want use your own twitter code - do changes in file /app/design/frontend/evoque/default/template/evoque/twitter_feeds.phtml

slideshow_static_block.label: Choose static html block instead of slideshow

slider.label: Slider
slider.comment:
Choose slider type.
Flex is simple, fully responsive slider.
Parallax is layered slider. You can create slides with unlimited layres.

toplinks_block.comment: Important! Choose ready example block 'Evoque Custom Toplinks'. If you have no this block then you need to do import cms blocks
toplinks_block.label: Choose static html block instead of 'Toplinks'

newsletter_block.label: Choose static html block instead of 'Newsletter'
newsletter_block.comment: Important! Choose ready example block 'Custom block instead of Newsletter'. If you have no this block then you need to do import cms blocks

run.label: Run now
run.comment: ATTENTION! Be sure that folder /skin/frontend/evoque/default/css/colors has 777 permission. After click on 'Save Config' click 'Refresh css files'. After this you will be able to see changes on storefront.

custom_css.label: Use custom css file
custom_css.comment: To use custom css file you must rename file skin/frontend/evoque/default/css/DELETE-PREFIXcustom_changes.css to custom_changes.css (remove just prefix 'DELETE-PREFIX')
